#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int run = 0;
int ball = 0;
int wicket = 0;
int MOD = 10000007;

int dp[10001][7];

void find_run( int i ) {
	if(i == 1){
		run = 0;
		ball = 1;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 2){
		run = 1;
		ball = 1;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 3){
		run = 2;
		ball = 1;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 4){
		run = 3;
		ball = 1;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 5){
		run = 4;
		ball = 1;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 6){
		run = 6;
		ball = 1;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 7){
		run = 1;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 8){
		run = 2;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 9){
		run = 3;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 10){
		run = 5;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 11){
		run = 1;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 12){
		run = 2;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 13){
		run = 5;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 14){
		run = 7;
		ball = 0;
		wicket = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 15){
		run = 0;
		ball = 1;
		wicket = 1;
	}
}

//int ans = 0;
int rec ( int nr, int nb){
	if(nr <= 0 || nb <= 0 ){
		//cout << "Returning " << 1 << endl;;
		return 1;
	}
	else if(dp[nr][nb] != -1){
		//cout << "Returning " << nr << " " << nb << "\t" << dp[nr][nb] << endl;;
		return dp[nr][nb];
	}
	else{
		int ans = 0;
		//ans = 0;
		for(int i = 1; i < 16; i++){
			find_run(i);
			if(wicket){
				ans++;
				/*while(ans >= MOD){
					ans-=MOD;
				}*/
				ans%=MOD;
			}
			ans += rec(nr-run, nb-ball);
			/*if(ans >= MOD){
				ans-=MOD;
			}*/
			ans%=MOD;
			
		}
		
		return (dp[nr][nb] = ans);
	}
}

int main(){

	int t, n, i, j;

	cin >> t;
	//memset(dp, -1, sizeof dp);
	for(i = 0; i < 10001; i++){
		for(j = 0; j < 7; j++){
			dp[i][j] = -1;
		}
	}
	i = 1;
	while(t--){
		cin >> n;

		dp[n][6] = rec(n, 6);
		cout << "Case " << i++ << ": " << dp[n][6] << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
